amendment.description: Amendment exempts qualified law enforcement officers and retired officers from State laws prohibiting the carrying of concealed firearms.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 7 and printed in part B of H. Rept. 106-186 to exempt qualified law enforcement officers and retired officers from State laws prohibiting the carrying of concealed firearms.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 372 - 53 (Roll no. 237).
